metadata.title: CVE-2016-10120 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Firejail uses 0777 permissions when mounting (1) /dev, (2) /dev/shm, (3)/var/tmp, or (4) /var/lock, which allows local users to gain privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.38-1').
